All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adventure
Class that represents an adventure
AdventureDAO
Interface that calls the method to read and write files on api or json, depend of the classe loaded.
AdventureDAOAPI
Class that contains all the methods needed related to creating, and reading the API that contains the adventure.
AdventureDAOGSON
Class that contains all the methods needed related to creating, and reading the json file that contains the adventure.
AdventureManager
Class that contains all the method needed related to manage an adventure.
AdventureMonster
Class that form part of the class Adventure that save the information of the monsters inthe encounter.
Adventurer
Class that represents the character type "Adventurer".
ApiConection
Class For the api exception
ApiHelper
Helper class with the responsibility of reading and posting Strings to an HTTPS API.
Calculs
Class that contains the methods to calculate the random numbers.
Champion
Class that represents the character type "Champion".
Character
Class that represent a character
CharacterClass
Class that contains the methods needed to serialize and deserialize a abstract class to adapt it to a proper format to can save it in persistence.
CharacterDAO
Interface that calls the method to read and write files on api or json, depend of the classe loaded.
CharacterDAOAPI
Class that contains all the methods needed related to creating, deleting and reading the API that contains the characters.
CharacterDAOGSON
Class that contains all the methods needed related to creating, deleting and reading the jason file that contains the characters.
CharacterGame
Abstract Class that that represents the character in the game
CharacterManager
Class that manages all related to the character.
Cleric
Class that represents the character type "Cleric".
Controller
Controller for the user interface, talks to Menu and the diferent managers.
GameListener
Interfice that uses the GameManager to talk with the controller.
GameManager
Class that do all related to playing a game.
Main
Tha project main class, just holds the main methods.
Menu
The user interface.
Monster
Class that represents the monster.
MonsterDAO
Interface that calls the method to read and write files on api or json, depend of the classe loaded.
MonsterDAOAPI
Class that contains the method needed to read the monsters saved in the API.
MonsterG
Class that represents the monster in the game its an extension of the class Monster
MonstersDAOGSON
Class that contains all the methods needed related to reading the json file that contains the monsters.
Paladin
Class that represents the character type "Paladin".
Warrior
Class that represents the character type "Warrior".
Wizard
Class that represents the character type "Wizard".
